content.value:
For all those wondering, this is my son Yoda.  We share no blood but he is my life. He came from Dagobah (legally, of course) six years ago and lives with me in Malibu.

I am so proud of him and raising him has been the best, most rewarding thing I’ve done in my life.
content.html: For all those wondering, this is my son Yoda. We share no blood but he is my life. He came from Dagobah (legally, of course) six years ago and lives with me in Malibu. I am so proud of him and raising him has been the best, most rewarding thing I’ve done in my life.
